Name: Rogue Rising
About the game: 2d rogue light action. Exhilarating action with easy controls. Grab the relics and use your skills to conquer the tower. Even the toughest bosses are made easy by luck? . I've been working on a roguelite. I'd like to play some more with patterns that I've successfully built. That's how I feel. If you have a favorite build, you can save it and You can now save your favorite builds and use them in the end content. . Dot art with movement and We focused on the moving dots and the feel of action controls. . Since it's a roguelite game, the time per play is short . I hope you can play it easily and enthusiastically, and forget about time.
